name: Titanic Hydra
passive: Cleave: Basic attacks deal bonus physical damage to your target and nearby enemies based on your bonus Health.
description: Item that provides Attack Damage, Health. Passive effect: Basic attacks deal bonus physical damage to your target and nearby enemies based on your bonus Health.. Great for champions looking to maximize their damage output.
tips: Great for champions who want to maximize their damage output
Synergizes well with other damage items for burst potential
Consider building this when ahead to snowball your advantage
Provides excellent sustain in lane and during fights
The healing/lifesteal helps you stay in fights longer
